data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Soroti.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Soroti, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: There are 56,400 people living in the state of Soroti. Only about 18,696 might be believers.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Soroti, Uganda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Soroti.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Hindi people. Make the Hindi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Soroti, Uganda. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, please help the 18,696 believers in the state of Soroti to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Soroti, Uganda.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Soroti
location.people_groups_list: Meneng, Kaliko, Arab, Lebanese, Nyang'i, Karamojong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Meneng (7,800), Kaliko (13,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Karamojong (849,000)
